item.title: Building Agentic Systems: Why You Should Start with Humans as AI Agents
item.description: The rise of Agentic Systems is reshaping how we think about building complex AI solutions. Like early software architecture, the new wave focuses on modularity, separation of concerns, and safe boundaries â€” smaller specialized models working together, orchestrated by a central host system.
